item.description:
The Holidays can be a hard time of year for many people. Learning the four agreements and the power of using them can be life changing. Please read the book or listen to the tapes series if you h ave the opportunity between now and then.

We will cover example of how to use the tools and run through scenarios how way to incorporate these fine agreements into your life that night.

Be Impeccable with you word
Don't take anything personal
Don't make assumptions
Always do you best

It sounds hard or easy??? That is why group discussion and role playing can make the difference!

I hope to see you all there. I promise to do my best!!

Namaste~
Barb

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: The Four Agreements- What it is and how it changes Lives!
